content: this 12 crochet tote packs a lot of personalities boasting a checkered border and tweed-look section you ll work in the round using 2 strands of yarn for sturdy durability stitched completely in single_crochet the check pattern is achieved by carrying unused color across the top of stitches while the tweed section comes to life by working the 2 different shades of yarn together lily sugar n cream gives you so many colors to choose from so create a bag that suits your style yarns for model lily® sugar n cream™ 2 5 oz/70 9 g 120 yds/109 m contrast a sage green 00084 3 balls or 290 yds/269 m contrast b overcast 01042 2 balls or 140 yds/128 m contrast c ecru 00004 1 ball or 100 yds/93 m
